meanings.definition: To mess up or ruin something.
meanings.sent1: I bolloxing my homework by spilling juice on it.
meanings.sent2: She always ends up bolloxing her hair when she tries to style it herself.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally bolloxing the recipe by adding too much salt.
meanings.sent4: The storm bolloxing our plans for a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent5: His attempt to fix the computer only ended up bolloxing it further.

meanings.definition: To confuse or complicate a situation.
meanings.sent1: The new instructions bolloxing me, so I asked for help.
meanings.sent2: The different road signs can bolloxing drivers who are not familiar with the area.
meanings.sent3: Trying to follow his explanation only ended up bolloxing me more.
meanings.sent4: Her sudden change of plans bolloxing our entire schedule.
meanings.sent5: The magician's tricks always bolloxing my mind, making me wonder how he does it.

meanings.definition: A swear word used to express frustration or anger.
meanings.sent1: He shouted the bolloxing when he stubbed his toe.
meanings.sent2: She muttered a bolloxing under her breath when she realized she forgot her keys.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's use of bolloxing in his joke made the audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The bolloxing from the other driver made him roll up his window.
meanings.sent5: The child's innocent use of bolloxing shocked the adults in the room.
